meanings.definition: A person who holds adoptionist beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The adoptionist was convinced that Jesus was adopted by God.
meanings.sent2: The adoptionist presented their views on the early Christian beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The adoptionist joked that even God could use a little adoption sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to spirituality was adoptionist, seeing divine connection through chosen family.
meanings.sent5: The adoptionist's faith in divine adoption was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Relating to the adoptionist belief system.
meanings.sent1: The adoptionist perspective offers a unique view on religious history.
meanings.sent2: She studied the adoptionist texts to understand their theological stance.
meanings.sent3: The adoptionist interpretation of scripture added a fresh twist to the discussion.
meanings.sent4: His adoptionist approach to theology challenged traditional views.
meanings.sent5: The adoptionist teachings provided a different lens through which to view Christianity.
